thegiant.title: The Big Bounce House
thegiant.short_description: The world's largest bounce house - over 10,000 sq ft of bouncing madness!
thegiant.full_description: Experience the ultimate bouncing adventure in the world's largest touring bounce house! This massive inflatable wonderland spans over 10,000 square feet and features multiple bouncing areas, obstacle courses, and interactive games. With towering walls, bouncing floors, and endless fun zones, it's designed to provide hours of entertainment for the whole family.
safety_notes: No shoes, jewelry, or sharp objects allowed
Adult supervision required for children under 8
Maximum weight limit: 300 lbs per person
No food or drinks inside the attraction
